title: Floral Symphony Necklace - A Modern Twist on the Traditional Haaram
materials: Crafted in a mix of 18K Rose Gold and White Gold
adorned with shimmering Zircon stones and vibrant Pink Tourmaline. Features an intricate Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine and luster.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a captivating floral design, blending modern aesthetics with traditional Haaram elements. The piece features meticulously set Zircon stones to resemble delicate flower petals, complemented by uniquely cut Pink Tourmaline gemstones. The drop pendant adds a touch of elegance. Each detail showcases exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: The necklace features a beautiful blend of rose gold
creating a harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional Telugu ceremonies like weddings
as well as modern events and celebrations. A statement piece that elevates any ensemble.
description: This necklace is a true masterpiece, combining traditional design sensibilities with contemporary styling. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure both beauty and durability. Its unique floral design and vibrant color palette make it a standout piece, guaranteed to be cherished for generations.
